title: Introduction to Quantum Mechanics
itunes:subtitle: Philosophy Now Radio Show #4
itunes:author: Philosophy Now
description: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now talks to Manjit Kumar, author of Quantum, about quantum mechanics. First broadcast on 21 June 2011 on Resonance FM.
